member.name: T:MedicationService.Controllers.MedicationsController
member.summary: RESTful API controller for managing medication schedules. This is a minimal implementation with in-memory storage for demonstration purposes.

member.name: M:MedicationService.Controllers.MedicationsController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a specific medication by ID
member.response: If the medication is not found

member.name: M:MedicationService.Controllers.MedicationsController.Update(System.Guid,MedicationService.Models.DTOs.UpdateMedicationDto)
member.response: If the medication is not found

member.name: M:MedicationService.Controllers.MedicationsController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.response: If the medication was successfully deleted
If the medication is not found

member.name: T:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.CreateMedicationDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for creating a new medication schedule

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.CreateMedicationDto.UserId
member.summary: ID of the user who will take this medication

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.CreateMedicationDto.Instructions
member.summary: Optional instructions for taking the medication

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.CreateMedicationDto.StartDate
member.summary: Start date for the medication schedule

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.CreateMedicationDto.EndDate
member.summary: Optional end date for the medication schedule

member.name: T:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.MedicationResponseDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for medication responses

member.name: M:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.MedicationResponseDto.FromEntity(MedicationService.Models.Medication)
member.summary: Maps a Medication entity to a response DTO

member.name: T:MedicationService.Models.DTOs.UpdateMedicationDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing medication schedule. All fields are optional to support partial updates.

member.name: T:MedicationService.Models.Medication
member.summary: Represents a medication schedule in the system. This is a first-class domain entity as per architecture rules.

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.UserId
member.summary: ID of the user (elderly person) who takes this medication

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.ScheduledTimes
member.summary: Scheduled times in simple string format (e.g., "08:00, 20:00")

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.Instructions
member.summary: Additional instructions for taking the medication

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.StartDate
member.summary: Start date for this medication schedule

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.EndDate
member.summary: Optional end date for this medication schedule

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the medication was created

member.name: P:MedicationService.Models.Medication.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the medication was last updated
